Corner Building
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bradbury, Eugene (American architect, 1874-1960) [architect]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From the north, showing hospital coal towers behind

Built to house post office, shops and tearoom. Moved from original to present location, 1927. Student Health Center located here, 1962-1989. Currently houses the Women’s Center and other administrative offices. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
